titleStmt.title: SII 6.35: original edition by K. V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 35. (A.R. No. 85 of 1897). AT THE LEFT OF ENTRANCE INTO THE FRONT GOPURA OF THE JAYANGONDANATHA TEMPLE AT MANNARGUDI, MANNARGUDI TALUK, SAME DISTRICT.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti . samastabhuvanāśraya śrīpṛdhvivallabha mahārājādhirāja parameśvara dvāravatīpuravarādhīśvara yādavakulāṁbaradyumaṇi sarvajña cūḍāma
ṇi malarājarāja malaparoḷugaṇḍa kandanapracaṇḍa kaṇḍabheruṇḍa Ekāṅgavīra kasahāyaśūra śanibaārasiddhi giridurggamalla caladaṅkarāma vairībhakaṇṭhirava makararājyani
rmūlana pāṇḍyakulasamuddharaṇa coḷarājyapritiṣṭhācāryya niśśaṅkapratāpaccakravatti pośaḷa śrīvīrarāmanāthadevarasar·
Uṭaiyār ceyaṅkoṇṭacoḷīśvaramuṭaiyār tirunāmattukkāṇiyum Ūrkkīḻ Iṟaiyiliyumāṉa nilattukku Iṟaiyili ceytapaṭikku tevar tiruve
ḻuttiṭṭaruḷiṉa Irācatappaṭi . svasti . samastatiripuvaṉāśiriyanāṉa pirutivallapaṉ makārācātirāca parameśvara tuvārāpatipuravarātīśvara yātavakulāmprācāmaṇi sarvvajñacūlā
maṇi malarācarāca malapattirateṇṭa kaṇṭapiracaṇṭa teṇṭaperuṇṭa kaṇṭa Ekāntavīra sakāyacūṭāmaṇi canivārasitti kirituṟkkamalla calateṅkarāma vaitipakaṇṭi
rava makatarācciyaniṉmūlaṉa pāṇṭiyakulasamuttiraṇa coḻarācciyapirutiṣṭṭācāriya nirvātapratāpaccakkaravatti pocala vīrarāmanātatevarasaṉ cuttamalivaḷanā
ṭṭut taṉiyūr rājādhirājaccaruppetimaṅkalattu Uṭaiyār ceyaṅkoṇṭacoḷiśvaramuṭaiyār koyil tāṉattārkku Innāyaṉāṟkku Innāṭṭu Iraṇṭāvatuvaraiyum Iṟup
put tirunāmattukkāṇiyum Ūrkkiḻ Iṟaiyili tirunāmattukkāṇi nilattukku koyiṟkaṇakku neṟkuppaiuṭaiyāṉ celkaluṭaiyāṉ kaṇakkuppaṭi Innāṭṭut tirunāmattukkāṇi
yāṉa rājādhirājaccaruppetimaṅkalattu nilam pattoṉpatumā varaikkāṇi muntirikai kiḻ muṉṟumāka kāṇikku tā ṉapaṭi nellu muṉṉūṟṟu Aimpattaiṅkalaṉe patakku muṭittalai
koṇṭacoḻaccaruppetimaṅkalattu nilam Eḻupattorumā mukkāṇi Araikkāṇik kiḻmuṉṟu māvukku tarappaṭi nellu
yāṉa bramateyattu nilam Iraṇṭumā mukkāṇi muntirikaikku tarappaṭi nellu patiṉeṇkalaṉe tūṇiyum Ālattūr ceyāṉa cempi ṉorumā varaikkāṇik kiḻ
mukkālukku Oṭṭuppaṭi nellu muṉṉūṟṟaimpatteḻu kalaṉe Irutūṇik kuṟuṇiyum Āka nila munnūṟṟu nāṉmā varaiye Araikkāṇi muntirikai kiḻ ṭumāk kāṇikku Iṟuppu
varukiṟa nellu Āyirattaṟunūṟṟu muppattirukalamum Innilattu veṭṭi parivāram Ūrkaṇakku civitattāl Opāti varuvaṉavum Antarāyam pāṭ Iraṇṭāvatuvaraiyu
m Iṟaiyiliyāy varukiṟa rājādhirājaccaruppetimaṅkalattu tevatāṉa Iṟaiyili nilam patiṉorumā mukkāṇi kiḻarai ṭṭil kaḻitta Ūrkiḻ
Iṟaiyili nilam muppatumāk kāṇi Araikkāṇi muntirikai kiḻeṭṭumāk kāṇiyum tiruñāṉacampantaccaruppetimaṅkalattu Ūrkiḻ yili nilam muṉṟu māvum Āka nilam nāṟpa
ttaiñcumāk kāṇik kiḻiraṇṭumā mukkāṇikkum veṭṭi parivāram Ūrkaṇakka civitattāl varuvaṉavum Innāyaṉār koyil tirumaṭaviḷākattu tiruñāṉacampan=taṉ maṭappu
ṟattukku rājādhirājaccaruppetimaṅkalattu maṭappuṟa Iṟaiyiliyāy varukiṟa nilam Oṉpatumā mukkāṇiyum Āka nilam nūṟṟaimpattoṉpatumā mukkāṇiyiṉāl
viriviṉpaṭi nilam nāṟpate mukkāle Iraṇṭumā mukkāṇi Araikkāṇik kiḻmukkālukkum kuṭimai koyiṟṟamappeṟu puṟaUṭal poṟkācu Uḷḷiṭṭut taṇṭu
m vaṟkaṅkaḷaṉaittum Uṭpaṭa Innāyaṉārkku namperāl kaṇṭa santikkum tiruppaṇikkum Uṭalāka muṉṟāvatu mutal tevatāṉa Iṟaiyiliyāka kuṭuttom Ivvuṭal ko
ṇṭu pūcaiyum tiruppaṇiyum tāḻvupaṭāmal celutti Ippaṭi cantirātittavarai celvatāka kalveṭṭik koḷka.
Digital edition of SII 6.35 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
